features: This Vanki bangle features a classic South Indian oval design, adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia. The central focus is a stunning Emerald Green oval-cut gemstone, exuding royalty. The Rose Gold plated metalwork showcases intricate detailing with circular patterns adding depth and texture to the design. A semi-open design that adds a modern touch and flexibility to fit most wrist sizes comfortably.
colors: Rose Gold metal with sparkling white cubic zirconia and a rich Emerald Green gemstone.

description: This Vanki bracelet blends traditional design with a modern aesthetic, making it a versatile and eye-catching piece. The high-quality cubic zirconia offers exceptional sparkle, while the Emerald Green centerpiece adds a touch of sophistication. With its comfortable fit and durable Hyderabadi Polish, this Vanki will be a treasured piece in any jewelry collection. A stylish statement piece.
